programme.title: Discovering the World's Culture
programme.desc: Nikki Bedi travels to Mardin in the south east of Turkey to immerse herself in the arts and culture of the region. The area is well known for its historic old town and unique landscape but is fast becoming a central player in Turkey's arts scene. In 2024, Mardin is playing host to its sixth biennial, and Nikki will discover this festival through the eyes of local and international artists. Influential figures in the art world, like Ahmet Ogut, Gunes Terkol and Ayse Erkman, are showing exhibitions at the biennial and discussing the role that creative endeavour plays in their lives. Nikki meets the local artists seeking to embrace the local landscape and use the area for inspiration. And she visits local sculptor Nurettin Cakmak and glasswork artist Tacettin Ebu Barak to find out how the mythical Turkish figure of the Shahmaran plays into their work.

programme.title: World's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.sub-title: Japan's New Golden Route Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Marking the 60th anniversary of Japan's famous Shinkansen, rail enthusiast Paul Carter ventures along a new coastal rail route. Join Paul's travels from Tokyo, as he stops at the stunning mountain springs of Unizakeonsen, sees Kanazawa, a city that gleams with gold, and meets the resilient artisans of Wajima as they fight to save age-old crafts. Relax and enjoy the ride as Paul seamlessly blends high-speed rail with slow travel, uncovering hidden gems along the New Golden Route.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.sub-title: Travel Man: 96 Hours in Iceland Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Joe Lycett takes over from Richard Ayoade as host of the offbeat tourism show. His first celebrity travelling companion is Bill Bailey, who joins him on a festive getaway to Iceland. The pair explore glaciers, volcanoes, geysers, and black sand beaches, sample local culinary delights, and relax with a plunge in the country's famous Blue Lagoon

programme.title: Deck the Halls: The Luxury Christmas Decorators
programme.desc: Behind the scenes with the Liverpool-based company responsible for decorating some of Britain's most famous landmarks for Christmas, following preparations at sites ranging from the Natural History Museum and Blenheim Palace to Alder Hey Children's Hospital and London's exclusive Lansdowne Club. After last year's cancelled Christmas, the teams are more determined than ever to create the biggest and best ever festive season - but face several unexpected hiccups along the way

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.sub-title: The Park Restaurant and Bar Season 3, Episode 7
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits a gastropub in Oak Park, California, pitched close to ranches often used in TV and film productions. Kirin and Angelika Stone own the place, but have lost their home in the wildfires that ravaged California. Can Gordon and his team help save their restaurant?

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Rick Smiciklas, the founder and CEO of the Wild Wing chicken wing chain, goes incognito among his workforce to find out the impact of his recent downsizing operation. For one week, he poses as one of his own employees to see how he can make the company even more efficient

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Don't Go Breaking My Heart Season 10, Episode 9
programme.desc: Part three of three. As Niles continues to recover from open-heart surgery, he masks his fear of death with overconfidence and an elaborate show of zest for life. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The brothers visit a luxury spa, where they are astonished to discover they are not enjoying the highest level of service and try to sneak into an area reserved exclusively for its most valued members. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles is left with no choice but to see patients in his apartment, while Frasier is forced to share his studio and airtime with an arrogant financial analyst - and later finds himself accused of sexually harassing her. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Lilith Needs a Favour Season 10, Episode 13
programme.desc: Lilith pays an unexpected visit and asks Frasier an unusual favour, while Niles worries about Daphne, who has gone with Roz, Alice and Mrs Moon on a road trip to Canada. Guest starring Millicent Martin and Bebe Neuwirth, with Kelsey Grammer, David Hyde Pierce and Jane Leeves

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game with comedian Marcus Brigstocke joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: Cheers
programme.sub-title: Bar Wars II - The Woodman Strikes Back Season 7, Episode 10
programme.desc: The day of the annual Boston Bloody Mary Competition dawns and Sam and the gang are determined to beat Gary's Old Town Tavern this time, even if it means cheating

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: An entrepreneur leaves his pet in Rebecca's apparently capable hands, but Sam jeopardises her job by letting the dog escape. Comedy, starring Ted Danson and Kirstie Alley

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam still believes he can win over Rebecca, especially when she admits there is a song that makes her feel romantic. Cliff trains a new female postal worker, but ends up falling for her. Comedy, starring John Ratzenberger

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie tries to expand her social life by going out with her work colleagues, so Doug resorts to crude tactics to scare them off. Meanwhile, Spence and Danny use Arthur as a means of attracting women

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Danny comes down with lockjaw and Doug fritters away money on his credit card. Meanwhile, Arthur takes on front-desk duties at the senior centre, where he comes into conflict with the pudding seller

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Arthur tries to persuade Doug to be his partner in the senior centre's shuffleboard tournament - but doesn't bargain on him being hopeless at the game. Meanwhile, Carrie pretends to be ill in an effort to get Holly to cook for her

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: And the Dish Ran Away with the Spoon Season 8, Episode 1
programme.desc: Double-length episode. Donny issues a lawsuit against Daphne for jilting him at the altar, and Mel plots revenge against Niles after he abandoned his marriage to her. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce, Jane Leeves and Saul Rubinek

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A lovestruck Frasier persuades Martin to look round a retirement home because he wants to meet the establishment's attractive manager. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Great Crane Robbery Season 8, Episode 4
programme.desc: Mel tries to embarrass Niles, and Frasier is aghast to discover the new station owner has copied the decor of his apartment in a bid to appear sophisticated. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Headline update

programme.title: Too Close for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman's feelings start to change when she reluctantly spends Christmas with the man responsible for ending her last relationship. Director Ernie Barbarash's festive drama, starring Chad Michael Murray, Jessica Lowndes and Vanessa Sears

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jamie invites his family to join him in his outdoor kitchen shed and makes smoked trout p√¢t√©, served with red cabbage slaw and a giant Yorkshire pudding for sharing. He gives the traditional turkey a run for its money with festive porchetta, crispy root veg and roast potatoes, and also takes a Christmas staple to new heights in his vegetarian main, a chestnut and Brussels sprouts pie

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words and numbers game. Christopher Biggins is in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Over the five years they have been together, engaged couple Carrie and Alex have made regular trips to Majorca. They love the place so much that they're planning to get married there and purchase their dream home. Ben Hillman shows them five properties to consider within their ¬£220,000 budget

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At the picturesque Ch√¢teau de la Fare, Janet and Philip have noticed that their hallway is looking tired, so decide to re-deck the halls before family arrive. Further north in the Charente-Maritime, there's a Christmas miracle as Bart and Sarah hold their big extravaganza. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: This run concludes with a special episode looking back at some of the best (and worst) accommodation, low scores, tense arguments, dramatic moments and behind-the-scenes gossip

programme.title: Kirstie's Handmade Christmas
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp holds a Christmas decoration competition and the expert judge demonstrates how to make napkins that'll be the talk of the table. Plus, how to make a pop-up Christmas card, and a throwback to Christmases past for another look at sweet sugar craft

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Kill Gil, Volumes I & II Season 18, Episode 8
programme.desc: Department store Santa Gil grants Lisa's Christmas wish, but loses his job as a result. Feeling guilty, the family offers him a bed for the night - but he promptly moves in, along with all of his belongings. As the uninvited lodger becomes a pest, Marge looks for ways to get rid of him

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Junior Taskmaster
programme.sub-title: Shout-out to Slow Maths Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: Contestants - all aged between nine and 11 - are on tenterhooks as they compete in the second semi-final. Junior Taskmaster Rose Matafeo scrutinises their every move and loyal assistant Mike Wozniak offers moral support as the hopefuls pull no punches moving caterpillars, playing football and doing some good old-fashioned detective work

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Some of Britain's best-loved personalities turn their hand to being the country's most opinionated viewers in this look back over the standout moments from series six. Programmes under consideration include Bridgerton, MILF Manor, George Clarke's Amazing Spaces, In with a Shout, America's Sweethearts: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe, and coverage of the Glastonbury Festival and Donald Trump's victory in the 2024 US presidential election

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by guests including Rev Richard Coles and Alex Jones for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days. As usual, the hashtag #isitok paves the way for the gang to round up, examine and explain the leading and most entertaining news stories of the week

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts a combination of the comedy panel show and the long-running words and numbers quiz, inviting Jon Richardson and Jack Dee to take on Lee Mack and Rose Matafeo in a festive-themed edition. They're joined by guests Stevie Martin and Joe Wilkinson, and Countdown regulars Susie Dent and Rachel Riley

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: A sceptical 18th-century detective is sent to a small hamlet supposedly terrorised by a demonic headless horseman who decapitates his victims. The investigator refuses to believe in the supernatural, convinced a human killer is behind the murders - but the legend proves to be all too true. Tim Burton's gothic horror, starring Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, Miranda Richardson and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Bear's Ben Pizza in Conway, Arkansas, a university town with a large student and faculty population. Friends Brad and Steven launched the joint in 2008 and initially it was a success, but business dropped off due to having a reputation for passionless food - most of which is microwaved

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Katharine Schmidt, executive director of non-profit organisation Food Banks Canada, dons a disguise to help out in one of the company's soup kitchens. Almost one million citizens, 40 per cent of them children, rely on the company's services each month

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer present highlights from Sunday Brunch

programme.title: Jamie's Comfort Food
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gives some of the nation's favourite dishes a twist, reinventing British classics, rustling up outdoor treats and transforming old-school puddings

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne offers to host a dinner party to celebrate Niles' latest purchase, knowing that previous soirees held by the brothers have ended badly. However, her own efforts fail to work out much better and Frasier is forced to lend a clandestine hand, while Martin masquerades as a famous artist

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: A forthcoming squash tournament has Frasier on the lookout for a new partner, and an attractive gym coach seems to fit the bill. When lust blooms, the teacher's aggressive performance techniques cannot help but remind the psychiatrist of his old gym teacher. Comedy, guest starring Jeanne Tripplehorn and Bob Hoskins, with Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne's mother infuriates Martin by meddling in his romantic affairs, while Frasier and Niles take part in a charity cycling event - even though neither of them knows how to ride a bike

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Kenny on the Couch Season 10, Episode 17
programme.desc: Martin dispenses advice to a depressed Kenny, leaving Frasier feeling jealous, and a yoga class goes badly for Niles, who is taken aback to discover he is not as supple as Daphne. Guest starring Alan Cumming

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: A mischievous trio of talking chipmunks invade a struggling songwriter's home. When the furry critters demonstrate a remarkable talent for singing, he agrees to help them find fame and fortune. However, an unscrupulous record company boss has other plans. Children's comedy, starring Jason Lee and David Cross, with the voices of Justin Long, Matthew Gray Gubler and Jesse McCartney

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Marge Be Not Proud Season 7, Episode 11
programme.desc: Marge learns Bart has been caught shoplifting the latest video game, and decides it is high time he learned to behave more responsibly

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Kill Gil, Volumes I & II Season 18, Episode 8

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Skinner's Sense of Snow Season 12, Episode 8
programme.desc: A snowstorm leaves Bart, Lisa and their fellow students trapped inside Springfield Elementary and it is not long before the pupils are running amok. Homer and Ned Flanders are left to mount the rescue operation to save the kids - and Principal Skinner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After a failed Black Friday shopping spree, Marge is determined to fix Christmas, but Homer and the kids surprise Marge with a holiday at a Florida resort

programme.title: Homegrown Christmas
programme.desc: A former CEO returns to her home town in search of some perspective, but ends up having a tense encounter with an old boyfriend from her teenage years. When they are forced to work together on a high school dance, it leads them to reflect on the choices they have made in their lives and recapture their old feelings for one another. Romantic drama, starring Lori Loughlin and Victor Webster

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition continues at Ullswater View in the Lake District, where Julie and her friend Sarah plan to give the B&Bers a touch of luxury. programme.title: Four in a Bed

However, tensions rise during a trip to a local brewery - and they're not eased by a complaint about the sleeping situation

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Scrooged

However, on Christmas Eve, three ghosts arrive in the night and challenge him to change his cynical ways by showing him his past, present and future. Comedy based on Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, starring Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, David Johansen and Carol Kane

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: With sport and weather

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody

Oscar-winning biopic, starring Rami Malek, Lucy Boynton and Gwilym Lee

However, as his patrol boat journeys further upriver, the conflict and disarray surrounding him becomes increasingly disturbing and nightmarish. Extended version of Francis Ford Coppola's acclaimed Vietnam War drama - re-edited in 2019 by the director himself to mark the film's 40th anniversary. Starring Martin Sheen, Marlon Brando and Robert Duvall

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares

He dons a fat suit and a new identity, and soon makes discoveries about staff morale and equipment, before the story of one worker's loss makes him realise the important steps he has to take

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus

Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

Animated comedy, with the voices of Zach Galifianakis, Jack Dylan Grazer, Ed Helms and Olivia Colman

Along the way, the train visits the Morteratsch Glacier, the Landwasser Viaduct and Lago Bianco, meeting people who live and work in the area including an artisan cheese-maker, a creator of traditional Christmas toys and a multi-generational musical farming family. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman and Bonnie Bedelia

programme.desc: Britain's Strongest Man. Action from Utilita Arena in Sheffield. Nine of the 12-man line-up had locked horns at World's Strongest Man, with four having made the final. They competed in events including the Deadlift, Axle Press, Sandbag Throw and a new event for 2024, the Blacksmith Medley, designed to push the athletes to the very limit. Presented by James Richardson and Radzi Chinyanganya, with commentary provided by Danny Wallace and Colin Bryce

programme.title: Royal Palaces at Christmas
programme.desc: Stories about the royal family during the festive season, from dancer Wayne Sleep revealing he was smuggled into Kensington Palace to give Princess Diana private lessons to a pub landlord who had Elizabeth II as a customer after she was stranded by a snowstorm. There is the tale of how Sandringham became a Christmas palace thanks to a wayward Prince of Wales needing a country home for feasting and entertaining, and how Elizabeth II would travel to Norfolk for Christmas by commuter train

programme.title: Royal Christmas Traditions: Then & Now
programme.desc: A look at what the royal family get up to during the festive period, revealing how King Charles and his family create their perfect royal Christmas at Sandringham. From holiday stresses to surprising traditions like Henry VIII's love of turkey, the programme uncovers the regal roots of some of our own cherished festivities, while royal insiders also divulge the secrets of hosting a truly royal Christmas

programme.title: When Christmas TV Goes Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: Noddy Holder narrates this extended special looking at the unplanned, unwanted but often hilarious moments that have beset the world of TV during the festive season. Festive cock-ups include Christmas trees that won't stand up and kids' toys that won't shut up, via the worst yuletide movie ever and some distinctly misguided TV adverts. Clips feature a host of stars, including Eamonn Holmes and iconic TV chef Fanny Cradock, while things go horribly wrong for Piers Morgan at a Christmas lights switch-on and singer Patti LaBelle forgets the words in front of then-US president Bill Clinton

programme.title: Warship: Life at Sea
programme.desc: HMS Northumberland is deployed off the west coast of Ireland and receives intelligence that a Russian warship has been spotted heading towards Faslane, the home of the British Trident submarine base. There is a concern that if gets too close it could pick up details of some the UK's nuclear secrets

programme.title: The World's Most Expensive Cruise Ships
programme.desc: The Seven Seas Splendor is on a Baltic Odyssey, with stunning views readily available from the passengers' panoramic balconies. Taking in impressive destinations such as Norway and Latvia, the ship is nearing the end of season at sea and the crew on board want to go out with a bang. In charge of all the ship's entertainment, cruise director Lorraine is laying on a special night on board, called Crew Capers. An exhilarating variety show performed at the end of the cruise, it's the chance for crew members to perform in front of the guests

programme.title: Wings of Desire
programme.desc: Two angels watch over the divided city of Berlin, occasionally coming down to help and comfort the lonely and depressed. One of the heavenly beings falls in love with a circus performer and wishes to become human himself. Wim Wenders' fantasy, starring Bruno Ganz, Solveig Dommartin, Otto Sander, Curt Bois and Peter Falk. In German, English, French, Turkish, Hebrew and Spanish

programme.title: Tad The Lost Explorer and the Curse of the Mummy
programme.desc: Chicago-bricklayer-turned-adventurer Tad is digging in Mexico when he finds an Egyptian sarcophagus hidden underground behind many booby traps. Tad falls into an abyss and has to be rescued by his more competent colleague - and sweetheart - Sara. Animated adventure, with the voice of Oscar Barberan

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy with facial disfigurements that have so far required almost 30 operations takes on a whole new challenge when, after being home educated his entire life, enters mainstream school for the first time. As he struggles to fit in, his fellow pupils and the community are forced to learn the power of compassion and acceptance. Julia Roberts, Owen Wilson and Jacob Tremblay star in Stephen Chbosky's drama, based on the best-selling novel by RJ Palacio

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they're relaxing for a few hours is somehow causing them to age rapidly, reducing their entire lives into a single day. M Night Shyamalan's horror, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Vicky Krieps and Rufus Sewell

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Two billionaire brothers engineer the downfall of a high-flying stockbroker, while giving a homeless conman all the advantages of wealth, as part of a bet to see whether heredity or upbringing determines character. Comedy, starring Dan Aykroyd, Eddie Murphy, Jamie Lee Curtis, Ralph Bellamy, Don Ameche and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: 48 Hrs
programme.desc: A hard-bitten cop goes on the trail of two escaped fugitives who killed several of his fellow officers. He needs someone with inside knowledge of the criminals, and is reluctantly forced to temporarily release a fast-talking thief from prison to help him in his investigation. Comedy thriller, starring Nick Nolte, Eddie Murphy and Annette O'Toole

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: An ordinary teenager is recruited by a mystical martial arts master for a vitally important quest. He must find seven magical spheres before they fall into the hands of an evil warlord, who intends to use their power to let him take over the world. Fantasy adventure based on the Japanese cartoon series, starring Justin Chatwin, Chow Yun-Fat and James Marsters

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents' teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: A music executive heads out to a Cornish fishing village on a mission to recruit a group of 10 local fishermen into recording an album of sea shanties. He struggles to win over the unlikely boy band and their families, but begins to gain a new appreciation for their traditional values. Comedy, starring James Purefoy, Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton

programme.title: Honest Thief
programme.desc: A bank robber falls in love, and decides the time has come to bring his life of crime to an end. He turns himself in to the FBI, only to be double-crossed by two crooked agents. Crime thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Kate Walsh and Jai Courtney

programme.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
programme.desc: In the late 1960s, several strangers, many with a secret to bury, meet by chance at a rundown Lake Tahoe hotel with a dark past. During the course of one night, everyone will show their true colours. Director Drew Goddard's mystery thriller, starring Jeff Bridges, Cynthia Erivo, Dakota Johnson and Chris Hemsworth

programme.title: Werewolves Within
programme.desc: A proposed gas pipeline divides the small town of Beaverfield. The day its residents meet at the local inn, a severe snowstorm batters the area, trapping everyone inside the establishment. As tensions between the opposing sides heighten, it is up to forest ranger Finn and postal worker Cecily to keep the peace and find out the person responsible for the appearance of a mysterious creature that is terrorising the community. Horror comedy, starring Sam Richardson and Milana Vayntrub

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: The eccentric time-traveller journeys to the Daleks' home world, which has been devastated by their nuclear weapons. He enters their city and finds them engaged in a plot to exterminate their peaceful humanoid enemies the Thals. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series, starring Peter Cushing, Roy Castle, Jennie Linden and Roberta Tovey

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: A secret agent branded a traitor tries to clear his name, with the aid of a socially awkward inventor he had fired for only developing non-lethal gadgets. The scientist's latest invention gets out of control and transforms the spy into a pigeon - giving him the perfect disguise to prove his innocence. Animated adventure, with the voices of Will Smith, Tom Holland and Karen Gillan

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: We Live in Time Interview Special
Dog
programme.desc: US Army Ranger Briggs is determined to regain his place at Joint Base Lewis-McChord in Washington. His superior officer agrees to return him to the fold if he can successfully escort a military working dog named Lulu along America's Pacific Coast to attend the funeral of her handler. Comedy, co-directed by and starring Channing Tatum

programme.title: Spencer
programme.desc: During her Christmas holidays with the royal family at the Sandringham estate in Norfolk, Diana decides to leave her marriage to Prince Charles, the family, and the life that comes with it. Drama, starring Kristen Stewart, Timothy Spall and Sally Hawkins

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.sub-title: Klaus and Rogu in Thank God for Loose Rocks: An American Dad! Adventure Season 16, Episode 5
programme.desc: The Smiths go to a dude ranch, but Klaus and Rogu have to work together to survive when they end up in the wilderness

programme.title: Celebrity Karaoke Club
programme.desc: The celebs have survived to sing for another night in the Karaoke Club and they are joined by comedian Darren Harriott

programme.title: The Stand Up Sketch Show
programme.desc: Routines by some of the nation's best-loved comedians, including Jack Skipper, Desiree Burch, Nabil Abdulrashid, Sam Williams, Esther Manito, Jamie D'Souza and Dee Allum.

programme.title: Deep Fake Neighbour Wars
programme.sub-title: Deep Fake Neighbour Wars - Best Bust Ups Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: A special compilation episode of Deep Fake Neighbour Wars - the show that uses Deep Fake technology to turn the UK's best new impressionists into the world's most famous celebrities - only here they are ordinary people who happen to be embroiled in petty neighbour disputes. In this episode, Andy Murray and his mum, Lorraine Kelly, clash with RuPaul over noisy chickens, Idris Elba gets a shock when new neighbour Kim Kardashian starts making her presence known in their communal garden, and Greta Thunberg is upset by Conor McGregor and Ariane Grande's perennial Christmas decorations

programme.title: Deep Fake Neighbour Wars
programme.desc: Show that uses Deep Fake technology to turn the UK's best new impressionists into the world's most famous celebrities. Kim Kardashian's neighbour Idris Elba restricts her access to their shared garden, and Greta Thunberg is upset by Conor McGregor and Ariane Grande's perennial Christmas decorations

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records

programme.desc: The week's final visit is to Cambrian House B&B in Carno, Powys, where husband-and-wife team Jacqui and Ivan think their value for money will be unbeatable. First impressions are certainly good, but a prank by Tom during an afternoon out coracle paddling sinks the atmosphere

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Fri 29 Sept 2023: Payment Day Season 2023, Episode 50
programme.desc: The 1,000 episode sees auntie and niece duo Maxine Walker and Tegan Styles of Greenhills Hotel in Pembrokeshire get to the bottom of Tom's bathroom blues. Tom Beynon, owner of Three Cliffs Bay Holiday Park in south Wales also wants to know why he received a roasting for his hosting. Chef Dan Latham and partner Lucy Lonsdale of Tal-y-Cafn, Conwy, do not feel their hash browns were a burning issue, while Jacqui and Ivan Fabian of Cambrian House B&B in Powys, question whether tactics were played. Eventually, the payments are revealed and the winners announced

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: Air ambulance crews respond to headteacher Andy who has collapsed after a cardiac arrest in Essex and warehouse employee Rob who is trapped under a pallet of granite in Ipswich. Katie, who is 13-weeks pregnant, calls for help when she keeps having seizures and the Essex and Herts Air Ambulance crew help Jo who has been lying on the bathroom floor with a broken ankle for nine hours

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 79-year-old man arrives in hospital after collapsing in the street whilst walking his dog, and doctors give him medication to try and stabilise his very high heart rate. Meanwhile, a young boy is treated after pushing a plastic toy down his ear, and doctors show concern for a man who has numbness in his arm and little finger, and send him for a CT scan

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 64-year-old man is brought to St George's in an induced coma, having been thrown from his bicycle at high speed, with his wife by his side for support. Drama student Florian, 21, tripped and hurt his foot rushing to class, and he explains how he and his family fled war in Kosovo when he was a child, and the sacrifices his father made to get his family to safety

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: Air ambulance crews respond to headteacher Andy who has collapsed after a cardiac arrest in Essex and warehouse employee Rob who is trapped under a pallet of granite in Ipswich. Katie, who is 13-weeks pregnant, calls for help when she keeps having seizures and the Essex and Herts Air Ambulance crew help Jo who has been lying on the bathroom floor with a broken ankle for nine hours

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: In Stratford-upon-Avon, on a meal out with her family, a woman fights to breathe as she suffers an allergic reaction and her tongue swells

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 79-year-old man arrives in hospital after collapsing in the street whilst walking his dog, and doctors give him medication to try and stabilise his very high heart rate. Meanwhile, a young boy is treated after pushing a plastic toy down his ear, and doctors show concern for a man who has numbness in his arm and little finger, and send him for a CT scan

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 64-year-old man is brought to St George's in an induced coma, having been thrown from his bicycle at high speed, with his wife by his side for support. Drama student Florian, 21, tripped and hurt his foot rushing to class, and he explains how he and his family fled war in Kosovo when he was a child, and the sacrifices his father made to get his family to safety

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jacqui Lockhart has worked hard all her life, and now that she has the savings available she wants to fulfil her lifelong dream of owning a holiday home on Spain's southern Costa Blanca. With a cash budget of ¬£50,000 and the support of her daughter Judy, the pressure is on for Danni Menzies to help Jacqui secure her dream property

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George visits a Victorian villa in Leeds, West Yorkshire, where Jawad and Charlie are planning a master en-suite which, if the rest of their quirky renovations are anything to go by, looks set to be a mammoth task. He also helps Jason and Hannah in Brixton, south London, who are tackling an ambitious two-storey extension. The big question is - should they lose their redundant chimney breast and increase the size of the room?

programme.title: Ugly House to Lovely House with George Clarke
programme.desc: The idyllic village of Hartley Wintney is often voted one of the best places to live in Britain - but every rose has its thorn. Fiona and Hugh's ugly Hampshire home has not been touched in decades, and they hate absolutely everything except the garden. They have ¬£180,000 budget to transform the entire house, so George enlists award-winning architect Greg Blee. However, while the owners buy into his modernist scheme the local planners do not. Can he salvage his design and come up with a scheme that will tick all the boxes?

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.sub-title: Amazing Spaces: George's Icelandic Adventure Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: George is joined by his friend, master craftsman Will Hardie, to explore the best of Iceland's architecture, from a cool, contemporary lake house and a traditional home made of turf to a treetop hotel room inspired by a Christmas bauble and a stunning, modernist build in the snowy wilderness. Along the way, the design duo also get to grips with mysterious elves, majestic horses, geothermal baths and wild camping

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Clairvoyant Yvette Tamara hosts the first dinner party in north Kent, and the night gets off to a spooky start when data analyst John Tower and working mother Yemi Christopher-Soares discover a ghost-busting machine. Meanwhile, jeweller Lisa Townend is so impressed with Yvette's abilities that she wants to return for a psychic reading

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Data analyst John Tower hosts the second dinner party in north Kent, and lets his passion for military re-enactment show when he barks orders at the table. However, not all the guests enjoy his fatty pork stew and psychedelic dessert, and two argue over dating etiquette

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Project manager Yemi Christopher-Soares hosts the third dinner party in north Kent, where she hopes the guests will enjoy her Nigerian-inspired menu and appreciate her love of all things spicy

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Jono Simm hosts the penultimate dinner party in north Kent and is convinced his wholesome and hearty menu is the way to win. However, two of his guests are less than impressed by his cooking

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Party-loving Lisa Townend hosts the final dinner party in north Kent, and hopes that a menu full of French fancies and innovative entertainment in the form of human roulette, will be enough to impress her guests and see her crowned winner of the ¬£1,000 cash prize

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: This week's competition kicks off at The Sportsman in Whitworth, Lancashire, where Steve and Georgia are hoping to win over their guests with bargain rooms and big breakfasts

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Sarah hosts the second visit of the week at Lahtle Wood Glamping in North Yorkshire, where she is joined in her duties by her sister-in-law, also called Sarah. The B&Bers find themselves cooing over the cabins when they pitch up, but Steve and Georgia aren't sure about the value. After a visit to an old air raid shelter, Steve drops some truth bombs on the other B&Bers about what he really thinks about the accommodation. Come feedback time, the Sarahs contend with some difficult comments about prices

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Joe hosts the third visit of the week, at the stately, Grade II listed Cley Hall Hotel in Lincolnshire. The B&Bers find themselves steeped in history, before letting out some anger as they try out blacksmithing but a noisy night drives Paul to distraction, and both the Sarahs get a little too hot under the collar

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The last visit of the week is to Bumble Barn Luxury B&B in Norfolk, where professional chef Paul and co-worker Debbie are looking to cook up a storm. Following a history lesson at an RAF museum, Paul indulges his guests by namedropping some of the illustrious people he's cooked for in the past. With expectations through the roof for breakfast, the pressure is on for him to deliver. However, some brutal feedback leaves Paul sharpening his extensive collection of knives ahead of Payment Day

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Payment Day, Fri April 19, 2024 Season 2024, Episode 5
programme.desc: Payment Day sees backstabbing, blazing barneys, explosive confrontations and plenty of vendettas to settle. Steve and Georgia aren't happy with their breakfast scores, the Sarahs are angry about their hot tub's frosty reception, Joe's tossing and turning about his sleep scores, and Paul is ready to take everyone to task about some low blows in his feedback. When the dust settles, the winner is finally revealed

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Rav Wilding is first to host a round of festive celebrity meals, entertaining Rebecca Adlington, Jennifer Ellison, Alex Carter and Mrs Moneypenny

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The celebrity competitors gather for the second party of the week, hosted by Olympic swimmer Rebecca Adlington, who opts for a Winter Games-themed evening

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Stage and screen actress Jennifer Ellison hosts the third dinner party, and hopes an evening of 'restaurant quality' and a singing waiter will be enough to impress her guests

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Former Hollyoaks and Emmerdale actor Alex Carter plans an Indian-themed curry menu for the fourth festive dinner party, but his choice of dishes meets a mixed reception

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: SuperScrimpers' own Mrs Moneypenny hosts the fifth and final party of the contest, choosing a traditional Christmas set-up, complete with venison on the menu

programme.title: The Storms That Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Trees were felled, trains were cancelled, Gatwick Airport was in chaos and 50,000 homeowners made do without power. This documentary, the first of two telling the stories of those who bore the brunt of the bad weather over Christmas 2013 and the surrounding period, features amateur footage, eyewitness testimony and expert commentary

programme.title: The Emergency Ward
programme.desc: Dr Michelle Thornhill treats a 55-year-old DJ who collapsed with severe heart and breathing issues. A senior nurse becomes a patient after being stung by a swarm of bees

programme.title: Inside the Bomb Squad
programme.desc: Members of the Army's EOD and Search Regiment head to the Isle of Man, where police believe they have found a bomb-making factory in a garage, while Sgt David Podmore investigates when the coastguard reports a possible torpedo on a Wirral beach

programme.title: Inside the Bomb Squad
programme.desc: Sgt David Podmore is called to investigate an explosive substance in his unit's home city of Chester, where police have found an arsenal of weapons, but are unsure of a chemical giving off smoke and have evacuated the area. The highly skilled search team uses hi-tech equipment and specialist dogs to look for weapons and explosive devices at the Birmingham hotel being used by for the Conservative Party Conference

programme.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
programme.desc: In the 28th century, two special operatives (Dane DeHaan, Cara Delevingne) race against time to save the diverse city of Alpha from a dark force that also jeopardizes the future of the universe.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: Witchville
programme.desc: Prince Malachy (Luke Goss) returns home from the Crusades and finds the kingdom haunted by a dark force after his father's death.

programme.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
programme.desc: In the 28th century, two special operatives (Dane DeHaan, Cara Delevingne) race against time to save the diverse city of Alpha from a dark force that also jeopardizes the future of the universe.

programme.title: The Legend of Hercules
programme.desc: Exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules (Kellan Lutz) must use his formidable powers to fight his way back to his rightful kingdom.

programme.title: All About Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Evelyn's (Haylie Duff) future depends on whether or not she makes a flight to Los Angeles. She lives out both futures in parallel: In one she plans a huge Christmas event, and in the other she becomes an artist.

programme.title: I'm Not Ready for Christmas
programme.desc: Holly's world is turned upside down when her niece's wish to Santa Claus comes true and she cannot tell a lie. As her career and love life go into disarray, she must learn to judge between the truth and what is right.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Secret revelations, major life-changes and inevitable bickering mark a Chicago family's (John Leguizamo, Freddy Rodriguez, Elizabeth Pe√±a) Christmas reunion.

programme.title: Daybreakers
programme.desc: Faced with a critical blood shortage, a vampire hematologist (Ethan Hawke) joins forces with humans (Willem Dafoe, Claudia Karvan) to perfect a cure for his problem.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: A lawman (Timothy Olyphant) and his wife (Radha Mitchell) and two companions fight to make it out of town alive after an unknown toxin turns ordinary citizens into bloodthirsty lunatics.

programme.title: Solomon Kane
programme.desc: A man (James Purefoy) must renounce his newly taken vows of peace to rescue a young woman (Rachel Hurd-Wood) from an evil sorcerer (Jason Flemyng).

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: A CIA operative (Jackie Chan) must protect his girlfriend's children from a Russian terrorist after one kid mistakenly downloads a top-secret formula.

programme.title: Bait Shop
programme.desc: The owner (Bill Engvall) of a small-town bait shop competes in a fishing tournament for the prize money to save his business.

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: An Army officer mistakes three buddies (Larry the Cable Guy, Bill Engvall, D.J. Qualls) for Army Reservists and deploys them to Iraq, but their vehicle is prematurely ejected over Mexico.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: Following the Japanese surrender at the end of World War II, Gen. Bonner Fellers (Matthew Fox) must determine whether Emperor Hirohito should be hanged as a war criminal.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: A mercenary (Sylvester Stallone) and his men learn that their assignment to overthrow a South American dictator is a suicide mission.

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Mercenary Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) and his team cut a swath of destruction through opposing forces as they take revenge for the vicious murder of a comrade.

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: After a former associate makes it his mission to end the Expendables, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) assembles a team of younger, tech-savvy recruits to help take down their enemy.
